Class UserCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rays.common.BaseCtl<UserForm,​UserDTO,​UserServiceInt>

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("User")
public class UserCtl
extends BaseCtl<UserForm,​UserDTO,​UserServiceInt>
